Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP25
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP25.Model

Class ActiveEffects

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP25.Model.ActiveEffects
public class ActiveEffects
extends java.lang.Object
ActiveEffects Class. ActiveEffects manages "effectList", an array containing players GodPower which effect influences opponent turns. For Example, if one of the workers of the player who has Athena as God Power moves up, we put an Object "Athena" in effectList to prevent the move up of Workers controlled by opponent players during their turn. effectList size is (numOfPlayers-1) so that GodPower which effect influences opponents turn are active only during opponent turn and only for 1 turn for each opponent player. effectList is used as a stack. During each players turn, an effect is added in position 0 and the effect in position (numOfPlayers-1) is removed. If the player GodPower does not influence opponent turn, a generic object belonging to the class GodPower is added to effectList.

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ActiveEffects​(int numOfPlayers)
    ActiveEffects constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void adaptEffectsAfterPlayerLose()
    Reduces the size of the effect list if one of the player in a 3-player game loses
    boolean canBuild​(Worker worker, Space space)
    Check if opponents' GodPowers in effectsList limit the building action of a Worker.
    boolean canMove​(Worker worker, Space space)
    Check if opponents GodPower in effectsList limits the movement of a Worker.
    boolean canWin​(Worker worker, Space space)
    Check if opponents GodPower in effectsList limits the winning conditions for a Worker.
    void initializeEffects()
    Initialize effectsList adding generic GodPower Objects which do not influence player turns.
    void pushEffect​(GodPower effect)
    Inserts an effect in position 0 in effectsList and remove the last GodPower in the stack (which effect is no longer valid).

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ActiveEffects

      public ActiveEffects​(int numOfPlayers)
      ActiveEffects constructor. Creates effectsList, a (numOfPlayers-1) size array containing GodPower objects.
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - number of players playing the game

  • Method Details

    • initializeEffects

      public void initializeEffects()
      Initialize effectsList adding generic GodPower Objects which do not influence player turns. (GodPower objects are added to avoid null pointer exceptions).

    • pushEffect

      public void pushEffect​(GodPower effect)
      Inserts an effect in position 0 in effectsList and remove the last GodPower in the stack (which effect is no longer valid).
      Parameters:
      effect - we have to add in position 0 of effectsList

    • canBuild

      public boolean canBuild​(Worker worker, Space space)
      Check if opponents' GodPowers in effectsList limit the building action of a Worker.
      Parameters:
      worker - who wants to build
      space - where the worker wants to build
      Returns:
      true if the GodPowers in effectList permit the building

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove​(Worker worker, Space space)
      Check if opponents GodPower in effectsList limits the movement of a Worker.
      Parameters:
      worker - we want to move
      space - where we want to move the worker
      Returns:
      true if the GodPowers in effectList permit the movement

    • canWin

      public boolean canWin​(Worker worker, Space space)
      Check if opponents GodPower in effectsList limits the winning conditions for a Worker.
      Parameters:
      worker - the player has moved
      space - where the worker has been moved
      Returns:
      true if the win condition is valid considering opponents' GodPower effects

    • adaptEffectsAfterPlayerLose

      public void adaptEffectsAfterPlayerLose()
      Reduces the size of the effect list if one of the player in a 3-player game loses
